languages.text: "Те, кого вы видите здесь — единственные выжившие. Точнее, единственные, кому удалось сохранить не только жизнь, но и разум. Я собрал кого мог, изолировал опасный источник и запустил сигнал бедствия. Мы дрейфовали, ожидая помощи и отбиваясь от сошедших с ума членов команды. Пока не появились вы".

traits.locale_text: "Те, кого вы видите здесь — единственные выжившие. Точнее, единственные, кому удалось сохранить не только жизнь, но и разум. Я собрал кого мог, изолировал опасный источник и запустил сигнал бедствия. Мы дрейфовали, ожидая помощи и отбиваясь от сошедших с ума членов команды. Пока не появились вы".

languages.text: "The people you see here are the only survivors. Or rather, the only ones who were able to retain both their lives and sanity. I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."
languages.original_text: "Те, кого вы видите здесь — единственные выжившие. Точнее, единственные, кому удалось сохранить не только жизнь, но и разум. Я собрал кого мог, изолировал опасный источник и запустил сигнал бедствия. Мы дрейфовали, ожидая помощи и отбиваясь от сошедших с ума членов команды. Пока не появились вы".

I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

"The people you see here are the only survivors. Or rather, the only ones who were able to retain both their lives and sanity. I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

"The people you see here are the only survivors. Or rather, the only ones who were able to retain both their lives and sanity. I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

languages.text: 「ここにいる者たちは唯一の生存者です。命と正気の両方を保てた者たち…と言ったほうが正しいかもしれません。私はできる限りの人を集め、危険物質を隔離し、救難信号を発信しました。助けが来るのを街ながら狂人と化したクルーたちと戦い、ただただ漂流しておりました。そこであなたが来てくれたのです」
languages.original_text: "The people you see here are the only survivors. Or rather, the only ones who were able to retain both their lives and sanity. I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

traits.locale_text: 「ここにいる者たちは唯一の生存者です。命と正気の両方を保てた者たち…と言ったほうが正しいかもしれません。私はできる限りの人を集め、危険物質を隔離し、救難信号を発信しました。助けが来るのを街ながら狂人と化したクルーたちと戦い、ただただ漂流しておりました。そこであなたが来てくれたのです」

languages.text: “您在这里看到的人，便是所有的幸存者了。更确切地说，是所有依然没有发疯的活人。我把所有能召集的人都召集起来，隔离了危险源，发出了求救信号。我们一边在太空飘荡，等待救援，一边击退那些发了疯的船员，然后您就来了。”
languages.original_text: "The people you see here are the only survivors. Or rather, the only ones who were able to retain both their lives and sanity. I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

traits.locale_text: “您在这里看到的人，便是所有的幸存者了。更确切地说，是所有依然没有发疯的活人。我把所有能召集的人都召集起来，隔离了危险源，发出了求救信号。我们一边在太空飘荡，等待救援，一边击退那些发了疯的船员，然后您就来了。”

languages.text: «La gente a la que ve aquí son los únicos supervivientes. Por lo menos, los únicos que además de su vida conservan la cordura. Reuní a todos los que pude, aislé la fuente del peligro y envié una señal de socorro. Estábamos a la deriva, esperando que llegara la ayuda y rechazando ataques de tripulantes enloquecidos. Hasta que llegó».
languages.original_text: "The people you see here are the only survivors. Or rather, the only ones who were able to retain both their lives and sanity. I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

traits.locale_text: «La gente a la que ve aquí son los únicos supervivientes. Por lo menos, los únicos que además de su vida conservan la cordura. Reuní a todos los que pude, aislé la fuente del peligro y envié una señal de socorro. Estábamos a la deriva, esperando que llegara la ayuda y rechazando ataques de tripulantes enloquecidos. Hasta que llegó».

languages.text: « Les gens que vous voyez ici sont les seuls survivants, ou plus précisément, les seuls membres de l'équipage ayant réussi à rester en vie sans sombrer dans la folie. J'ai rassemblé tous ceux que je pouvais, isolé la source du danger et envoyé un signal de détresse. Nous étions à la dérive, attendant des secours tout en repoussant les déments, lorsque vous êtes {mf|arrivé|arrivée}. »
languages.original_text: "The people you see here are the only survivors. Or rather, the only ones who were able to retain both their lives and sanity. I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

traits.locale_text: « Les gens que vous voyez ici sont les seuls survivants, ou plus précisément, les seuls membres de l'équipage ayant réussi à rester en vie sans sombrer dans la folie. J'ai rassemblé tous ceux que je pouvais, isolé la source du danger et envoyé un signal de détresse. Nous étions à la dérive, attendant des secours tout en repoussant les déments, lorsque vous êtes {mf|arrivé|arrivée}. »

languages.text: "Die Menschen hier sind die einzigen Überlebenden. Oder besser die Einzigen, die am Leben bleiben und ihren Verstand bewahren konnten. Ich habe so viele wie möglich gesammelt, die Gefahrenquelle isoliert und ein Notsignal gesendet. Wir trieben durchs All, warteten auf Hilfe und haben wahnsinnige Crewmitglieder abgewehrt. Dann seid Ihr gekommen."
languages.original_text: "The people you see here are the only survivors. Or rather, the only ones who were able to retain both their lives and sanity. I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

traits.locale_text: "Die Menschen hier sind die einzigen Überlebenden. Oder besser die Einzigen, die am Leben bleiben und ihren Verstand bewahren konnten. Ich habe so viele wie möglich gesammelt, die Gefahrenquelle isoliert und ein Notsignal gesendet. Wir trieben durchs All, warteten auf Hilfe und haben wahnsinnige Crewmitglieder abgewehrt. Dann seid Ihr gekommen."

languages.text: "Bu gördükleriniz, tek hayatta kalanlar. Daha doğrusu hem hayatlarını hem de akli durumlarını korumayı başarabilmiş olanlar. Toplayabildiğim kadarını yanıma aldım, tehlikenin kaynağını tecrit ettim ve bir acil durum sinyali gönderdim. Uzayda sürüklenip yardım gelmesini bekliyor, bu sırada da delirmiş tayfalarla savaşıyorduk. Sonra da siz geldiniz."
languages.original_text: "The people you see here are the only survivors. Or rather, the only ones who were able to retain both their lives and sanity. I gathered everyone I could, isolated the source of danger, and sent out a distress signal. We were adrift, waiting for help to come and fighting off mad crew members. Then you arrived."

traits.locale_text: "Tek hayatta kalanlar bu gördükleriniz. Daha doğrusu hem yaşamlarını hem de akli durumlarını korumayı başarabilmiş olanlar. Toplayabileceğim kadarını yanımda topladım, tehlikenin kaynağını tecrit ettim ve bir acil durum sinyali gönderdim. Uzayda sürüklenip yardım gelmesini bekliyor, bu sırada da delirmiş mürettebat üyeleriyle savaşıyorduk. Sonra da siz geldiniz."
